Reviews.Title: Trust fund baby: Lazy child of ambitious parents
Reviews.Author: Peter "Short Bald and Ugly"
Reviews.Content: Pros:Setup is easy, provided the default settings are to your liking. Unfortunately that is not likely. Picture quality is good, day, night or low-light. IR is a bit sketchy. Phone interface is intuitive, though limiting. Set points quickly re-align the camera, after it goes wandering.ConsUser manual, online or in paper, is useless. Internet support is non-existent. Phone support is in chinese only. PPPoE or SMTP are not supported in any way I can find. Some features, such as emailing in case of detected alarm do not work. Taking photos in case of alarms also do not work.Unit will realign itself for no reason, at random times, adjusting to random orientations. This means it may stare at the wall, not detecting any motion for weeks if you don't notice it, or are away on vacation.Phone interface works over WiFi only and has limited access to functions.

Reviews.Title: 4 out of 5 aint bad
Reviews.Author: Paul Borges
Reviews.Content: I would give the camera 5 stars but there are a few things that prevent that rating. First, the instructions are a little confusing and set up took longer than I expected. Second, I am using a Samsung Galaxy S4 and My wife the S3 we both have the android app for this camers and the camera does not utilize the zoom feature with this app, I am able to zoom with the home computer app but not the Samsung app!!! this is a big disapointment, hope they can fix this in the future!  Last, the power cord is very short, i had to plug the cord to an extension cord in order to plug it in. Other cameras offer extension cables for the power cord!  This company is in China, so customer service is limited.  I did e-mail them a few times and recieved responses but still would be nice to actually speak to someone!All in all it does what it is advertised to do!I also have the Geeya C601 and same thing applies to it that does to this one except the picture is a little more crisper with this one!

Reviews.Title: This is a long way from being product worthy
Reviews.Author: Stephen R Mayhugh
Reviews.Content: I just spent the entire day trying to successfully to get it to work. I will be returning this toy.Android OS- I got it to work on the Android with limitations.. the software is better than that developed for the PC. It doesn't zoom and the panning is painful at best. The audio and mic works. It needs a noise cancelling mic. It screams all the time.- The PC software is horrible. The video quality is compromised. The audio and mic functions don't work. The set-up is extremely painful.This systems is more of a toy and not yet ready for the consumer. Don't buy it. I don't have a better recommendation, but I wasted a day of my life. I will return to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Maria Victoria Zugazaga
Reviews.Content: I recommend it! The quality of the image is amazing and you can move the camera 350 degrees left, right, up and down. Really worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy for the Price
Reviews.Author: Ellen Immergut
Reviews.Content: We bought the GEEYA to use as a nanny-cam.  We couldn't afford to spend a lot of money (we have twins, after all!) and this camera came recommended from a friend.  It's pretty much plug n' play, although the instructions on how to access the camera from your mobile device aren't super clear. (and they are in TINY print)  We figured it out, though, for an Android and an iPhone.  It's great to be able to access the camera any time, adn to be able to see well in a dark room.  Note that two people cannot be logged in for viewing at the same time.  You can hear everything that's going on, and can even speak through the camera to the person in the room you are watching.  Don't expect a smooth camera feed.  It's a bit jumpy, and there is a delay.  The features are nice, though - I can pan all around the room, zoom in and out, snap still photos and even record video.  I have already recommended it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Not working
Reviews.Author: KARA1992
Reviews.Content: The product arrive on time but when I try to start the process it is not working as i expected. I even find a video to check where I did wrong but nothing, the product itself is broken.

Reviews.Title: Great product - spend a little more it is worth it
Reviews.Author: A M Hazeleger
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price - good build quality installation is a snap good picture quality chinese but very good

Reviews.Title: Working well.
Reviews.Author: M. Peters
Reviews.Content: Downloaded the iPhone eyesee-ipc app and it was easy  to setup and use remotely.So far no reason to not to recommend. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Fuchs
Reviews.Content: Purchased on different site, out of box defective pan did not work. Wireless set up can be dicey works then stops.

Reviews.Title: Worried because of other reviews.
Reviews.Author: Brian Hoyer "K-zoomigan"
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera tonight after work.  It was up and running in about 20 minutes and could control the video controls and view the image on my cell phone. (Android) Very nice daylight video but don't expect it to be as smooth as a video camera..  It took a little more setup but within another 30 minutes I had it all set up for my wireless home network for viewing.  The night view is in black and white but also nice and clear.  Just not as pretty.  I haven't figured out the alarm features but with a little time I assume that will be up and working in short order.  I have some networking experience so that may have made the setup easier.  I would definately recommend this to a friend.  I have to agree with other reviewers that the instructions are small print and could be more complete.

ProductInfo.Features:
Set up your IP Camera on your mobile device, no PC needed, features P2P technology, just plug and play.
IR-CUT Filter for 720P True Color Video and Images-Featured IR-CUT function, C801 can provide with vivid  and true color video and images, you will see the world as it shall be.
Excellent 24-Hour Surveillance IR (Infrared) LEDs turn on automatically to reveal clear monochrome video of the surrounding area. This unique function is unavailable on other traditional day/night cameras that offer moderately less video clarity.
Multiple Remote Viewing Options-C801 provides users with multiple remote viewing options. Users can look in on their cameras via the internet from their iPhone, iPad, Andriod or PC.
With a 355 degree horizontal pan, 120 degree vertical tilt field of view and 10 × Zoom ( available for iOS and PC ）, cover most sensitive surveillance area.
ProductInfo.Name: GEEYA C801 Mega 720P Wireless IP Camera with Pan/Tilt/Zoom and Night Vision, Andriod and iOS remote monitoring support(White)
